info.title: Interzoid Get Country Match Similarity Key API
info.description: This API provides a similarity key used to match with other similar country name data, including for purposes of deduplication, fuzzy matching, or merging of datasets. A much higher match rate will be achieved by matching on the algorithmically generated similarity key rather than the data itself.

get.summary: Gets a similarity key for matching purposes for country name data
get.description: Gets a similarity key to use for matching purposes for country name data

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: Your Interzoid license API key. Register at www.interzoid.com/register

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country name from which to generate similarity key

200.description: Generated similarity key for country name data
